Module Simulator
Package kin.model.closed

Class ClosedLegModel

java.lang.Object
kin.model.closed.ClosedLegModel
public class ClosedLegModel
extends java.lang.Object
A model object that represents a leg from passive element to unification point.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int AXISROT
    Leg type: a closed chain with a single axis-rotation passive element.
    static int AXISROT_LINEAR
    Leg type: a closed chain with a two passive element: axis-rotation and linear.
    static int FULLROT
    Leg type: a closed chain with a single full-rotation passive element.
    static int FULLROT_LINEAR
    Leg type: a closed chain with a two passive element: full-rotation and linear.
    static int LINEAR
    Leg type: a closed chain with a single linear passive element.
    static int NO_PASSIVE
    Leg type: a pseudo-closed chain leg, i.e. it does not contain any passive element.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement1, PassiveElementModel passiveElement2, ComponentModel unifyingElement)
    A leg to an closed kinematic chain with two passive elements.
    ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement1, PassiveElementModel passiveElement2, ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
    A leg to an closed kinematic chain with two passive elements.
    ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement, ComponentModel unifyingElement)
    A leg to an closed kinematic chain with a single passive element.
    ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement, ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
    A leg to an closed kinematic chain with a single passive element.
    ClosedLegModel​(ComponentModel unifyingElement)
    A leg to an pseudo-closed kinematic chain.
    ClosedLegModel​(ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
    A leg to an pseudo-closed kinematic chain.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(ComponentModel unifyingElement)
      A leg to an pseudo-closed kinematic chain. This means, the leg does not contain any passive element.
      Parameters:
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
      A leg to an pseudo-closed kinematic chain. This means, the leg does not contain any passive element.
      Parameters:
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs
      connectionPointNo - the connection point number (0...) of the unifying element which should be unified

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement, ComponentModel unifyingElement)
      A leg to an closed kinematic chain with a single passive element.
      Parameters:
      passiveElement - the passive element of this leg
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement, ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
      A leg to an closed kinematic chain with a single passive element.
      Parameters:
      passiveElement - the passive element of this leg
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs
      connectionPointNo - the connection point number (0...) of the unifying element which should be unified

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement1, PassiveElementModel passiveElement2, ComponentModel unifyingElement)
      A leg to an closed kinematic chain with two passive elements.
      Parameters:
      passiveElement1 - the passive element 1 of this leg
      passiveElement2 - the passive element 2 of this leg
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs

    • ClosedLegModel

      public ClosedLegModel​(PassiveElementModel passiveElement1, PassiveElementModel passiveElement2, ComponentModel unifyingElement, int connectionPointNo)
      A leg to an closed kinematic chain with two passive elements.
      Parameters:
      passiveElement1 - the passive element 1 of this leg
      passiveElement2 - the passive element 2 of this leg
      unifyingElement - the element of which the endpoint should be unified with other legs
      connectionPointNo - the connection point number (0...) of the unifying element which should be unified
